author: Harikumar J S
title: COVID-19: How techies in Kerala are connecting with each other to ride out the lockdown
description: From Instagram photo contests to push-up marathons, techies from Kerala keep themselves engaged while working from home
content: Varun Chandran, a techie from Thiruvananthapuram, now has more time at his disposal since switching to work form home due to the lockdown. The business analyst has also been on a 28-day quarantine after returning from Germany for an on-site assignment. So whe… [+3842 chars]
